summary statistics function

```{r}


sum_stat <- function(x) {
  
  total <- x %>%
    select(change) %>%
    drop_na() %>%
  summarise(
    n(),
    mean(change),
    sd(change)
  )
  
  nmisstotal <- x %>%
   select(change) %>%
   summarise_all(funs(sum(is.na(.))))
    
    
   bytreatment <- x %>%
  group_by(tx_text) %>%
  select(patient_id, tx_text, change) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
 summarise(
   n(),
   mean = mean(change),
   sd = sd(change)
 )
   
   nmissbytreatment <- x %>%
   group_by(tx_text) %>%
   select(change) %>%
   summarise_all(funs(sum(is.na(.))))
   
   result <- list(c(total, nmisstotal, bytreatment, nmissbytreatment))
   
  return(result)
}

sum_stat(cmpst_ham24tot)
```
